segments.text: Hey , what sort of drinks do you want ? Gatorade or water ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gatorade . It ’ s rich in Vitamin and it gives us energy and vitality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that ’ s the exact thing we need . One for each .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What should we do , now with Jack out of the game ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We should choose from the backups .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . Spraining the ankle and breaking the leg are the common things during the match .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s why we should learn to protect ourselves . Otherwise , the game is not worth the candle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s for sure . During the back court , we should change the position we played .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I played shooting guard , I like shooting and you ’ ll play inside , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree with you . I think we ’ ll play much better than before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , the cheer-section is coming . The music is so fantastic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , look how passionate they are ! Are they professional ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you should ask your friend . You know I ’ m not the boss . Just kidding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oops ! I almost forget about it . Do you see the girl in the middle of the first line ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t you think she looks like your daughter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also have a doubt . Oh , kill me softly , she is May .
segments.speaker: S1
